name: Myth of Sisyphus (elia feuertopf)
description:
An electrician gets ordered to a building to fix something on top of the roof. As he shows up to the job, he beholds an endlessly highrising office tower and gets trapped in a cycle of fighting his way up, dying and starting again from the bottom of the building without knowing the purpose of his struggles.

"The Myth of Sisyphus" is a fast paced, procedurally generated Roguelike with a focus on story, examining the philosophy of the absurd by Albert Camus. Try your best on fixing the elevator and climbing the tower to unlock all cutscenes and figure out why the electrician needs to go through all of this.

Programming/Unity: Anton Los (https://github.com/Wiblz/) - Music/Sound: Lukas Trautmann - Story/Design/Animation: Elia Zeißig

This game was made in three months during Critical Games Lab at Bauhaus University 2021.
